Package org.sat4j.tools.counting

Class SamplingSetAdapter

java.lang.Object
org.sat4j.tools.counting.SamplingSetAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
SamplingSet
public final class SamplingSetAdapter extends Object implements SamplingSet
The SamplingSetAdapter adapts an IVecInt to a SamplingSet.
Author:
Romain Wallon

      public IteratorInt variables()
      Description copied from interface: SamplingSet
      Gives an iterator over the variables of this set. These variables may appear in the parity constraints produced by ApproxMC.
